LANGUAGE.description: Button that indicates the current language of the program, represented by a flag

WORKSPACE_TOOLBAR_FULLSCREEN.description: Located in the upper right corner, enlarges the window across the entire screen

WORKSPACE_TOOLBAR_RESTORE.description: Same button as Fullscreen, restores the window to it's previous dimension

WORKSPACE_TOOLBAR_MINIMIZE.description: Located in the upper right corner, reduces the window to a small title and hide its contents

WORKSPACE_TOOLBAR_ABOUT.description: Located in the help menu, displays informations about the application

WORKSPACE_PROJECT_NOTEBOOK.description: Tool for project management and task management

WORKSPACE_BOARD_CONNECT.message: Vyberte zariadenie, ku ktorému sa chcete pripojiť

WORKSPACE_PROJECT_LIBRARY.description: Button that opens a modal with all the projects, with a folder icon as pictogram

WORKSPACE_TOOLBAR_EXIT_QUESTION.message: Ste si istý že chcete odísť?
WORKSPACE_TOOLBAR_EXIT_QUESTION.description: Select if you are sure you want to exit

EXIT.description: A button with the text exit
